basics.name: Yilin Liu
basics.label: Undergraduate
basics.summary: An undergraduate student at HKUST(GZ) majoring in Data Science and Big Data Technology. Now actively seeking for internship opportunities and research projects in the field of AI and Data Science.

volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for the New York City branch of the People's Climate March, the largest climate march in history.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
Men of the year 2014 by Time magazine

education.institution: Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (Guangzhou)
education.area: Data Science and Big Data Technology

awards.title: Second Prize in Blue Bridge Cup National Software and IT Talent Competition
awards.summary: Python Programming, Undergraduate Group A, Guangdong Province Division

awards.title: Gold Medal, Nomination Prize of Best New Basic Part
awards.summary: Awarded Gold Medal for excellence in synthetic biology and coral protection, with a nomination for robust experimental design and sensor characterization.

awards.title: Second Price in the 3rd Electrical & Electronic Engineering Innovation Competition (National Level)

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
